vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.26.38;
son of: Benjamin (H1144);
brother of: Bela (H1106A), Becher (H1071), Ashbel (H0788), Gera (H1617), Naaman (H5283), Ehi (H0278), Rosh (H7220), Muppim (H4649), Huppim (H2650H), Ard (H0714) and Jediael (H3043)
Group of a.chi.ram (אֲחִירָם "Ahiram" H0297)
§ Ahiramite = "brother of mother"
one of the clan of Ahiram
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Ahiram, hijo de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞希蘭族 这个形容詞在原文的意思是 "我兄弟被高舉" 或 "兄弟或崇高的人"
亞希蘭氏族之一員 (民 26:38)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚希兰族 这个形容词在原文的意思是 "我兄弟被高举" 或 "兄弟或崇高的人"
亚希兰氏族之一员 (民 26:38)
